courses.name: Small Business Advanced Social Media Strategy Crash Course
courses.content: Develop a social media marketing strategy for your small business. Gain a strategic understanding of driving sales traffic through social media.

courses.name: Complete Certification in Social Media Marketing with an option in Graphic Design and Photography
courses.content: Launch a successful career as a social media marketing manager with top firms. Gain relevant skills in all the areas of social media marketing.

courses.name: Complete Certification in SEO with an option in WordPress Website Development
courses.content: Search Engine Optimization specialists are in high demand across the Globe. Gain relevant skills in all the areas of SEO and work for top firms. Develop practical skills in building a website and optimizing.

courses.name: Executive Social Media and Digital Marketing Crash Course
courses.content: Are you a business executive looking to deepen your knowledge in social media and digital marketing? Enrol our Executive course designed in partnership with Koforidua Technical University.

courses.name: Online Shop Attendant Crash Course
courses.content: Begin a journey as a professional as an online shop attendant. Gain skills in all the areas in managing an online shop ie. Social media, e-commerce, accounting, customer service, product photography etc.

courses.name: Executive Social Selling and Digital Selling Crash Course
courses.content: Be a digital sales leader. Increase sales velocity and engage more prospects using social media platforms. The course is in partnership with Koforidua Technical University.

courses.name: Online Reputation Management and Applied SEO Crash Course
courses.content: For PR/Communication Managers; Protect the image of your business online through advanced social listening and bury negative information about your business in search through Advance search engine optimization.

courses.name: Social Media Marketing Training and Advertising Support for SMEs
courses.content: Access a completely free social media marketing program, e-commerce and gain daily support in driving sales, growing your customers and engaging your followers.
